org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker

Class CircuitBreakerHazelcastImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker.AbstractCircuitBreaker
      • org.openhubframework.openhub.core.circuitbreaker.CircuitBreakerHazelcastImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CircuitBreaker

    public class CircuitBreakerHazelcastImpl
extends AbstractCircuitBreaker
    Implementation of CircuitBreaker, that uses HazelCast already configured in OpenHub. It uses new key - HAZELCAST_KEY. Each circuit is stored as hazelcast distributed Map. (http://docs.hazelcast.org/docs/2.3/manual/html/ch02s03.html) To cope with possible race conditions, map is updated using IMap.executeOnKey(Object, EntryProcessor), that should handle it.
    Since:
    2.2
    Author:
    Karel Kovarik
    See Also:
    CircuitBreaker
